results.title: Asthma in the under 5's
results.creator_credit: Paul Roy, Jenny Ainge, Film Australia and Iguana Films (AU)
results.brief_description: Noni Hazelhurst presents interviews with parents and child care professionals who explore the difficulties in diagnosis and symptoms which suggest asthma. Provides a definition of asthma, discusses common triggers, asthma severity and outlines a six point management plan. 1. Assess severity 2. Achieve best lung function 3. Maintain best lung function 4. Optimise medications 5. Develop an action plan 6. Educate child and family and review regularly. Briefly addresses treatment strategies including medication types and preventative agents. Similarly, the role of support groups and the benefits of swimming classes. Accompanied by 4p. of Supporting Notes.

results.title: Asthma
results.creator_credit: Pat Phillips, Marie Meyrick and British Medical Television
results.brief_description: Asthma is the most common human ailment except for cold and flu. This excellent and informative video explains the physical and psychological effects of the condition, as well as investigating the range of treatments available for sufferers of asthma. Interviews with health professionals and people living with asthma stress the seriousness of the condition but the video makes clear that with proper treatment, medication and exercise the asthma sufferer can achieve a happy and active life. Produced by medical professionals, this video dispels myths about the disease and treats the asthma sufferer with intelligence and dignity.

results.title: Asteroids, comets and meteorites
results.creator_credit: Herbert Schick and Film Associates of California
results.brief_description: This film opens with pictures of man-made satellites and proceeds to show the characteristics of the minor members of the solar system - asteroids, comets and meteorites. Animated diagrams show the ways meteorites, comets and asteroids move in the system. Suitable for lower secondary level.

results.title: Asterix vs Caesar
results.creator_credit: Gaetan Brizzi, Paul Brizzi, Goscinny and Gaumont
results.brief_description: These Romans are crazy! Now they’ve miraculously captured two Gauls and sent them to a Legion camp in the furthest region of the Empire, the Sahara Desert. Asterix and Obelix set off to rescue their Gaulish comrades by joining the legion, only to find that they have already escaped. The search continues and our heroes end up in the Colosseum facing Romans, gladiators and lions galore. All your favourites are back in another Gaulish adventure. Asterix, Obelix, Dogmatix, Chief Vitalstatistix, the druid Getafix, Panacea, and more! Based on the popular books by Goscinny and Uderzo.

results.title: Asterix the Gaul
results.brief_description: Asterix, the adventurous hero is the cunning little warrior to whom all perilous missions are immediately entrusted. Thanks to the magic potion of the Druid, he is famed for his superhuman strength. As if that were not enough, his mighty friend, Obelix is always ready to drop everything to go off on a new adventure with Asterix, although he is never allowed to have a portion of the magic potion because he fell into it when he was a baby. Wherever excitement and danger reigns, you can be sure that our intrepid pair will be in the thick of it. So Romans beware, here comes Asterix the Gaul. Based on the popular books by Goscinny and Underzo.
